titles.title: Small Bank CRA Exemption Act
To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to exempt depository institutions which have total assets of $250,000,000 or less from the requirements of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Small Bank CRA Exemption Act - Amends the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to exclude depository institutions whose total assets do not exceed $250 million from its definition of regulated financial institution (thus exempting such entities from the requirements of the Act).
